uml2rca.conversion

Class ClassToFContextConversion

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.transformation.AbstractTransformation<S,T>
      • core.conversion.AbstractConversion<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Class,rca.FContext>
        • uml2rca.conversion.ClassToFContextConversion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IConversion<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Class,rca.FContext>, ITransformation<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Class,rca.FContext>

    public class ClassToFContextConversion
extends AbstractConversion<org.eclipse.uml2.uml.Class,rca.FContext>
    a ClassToFContextConversion concrete class that is used to convert a R-UML-conforming concrete class into an equivalent RCA formal context.

    The conversion consists of creating an equivalent target formal context having the same name as the source concrete class.
    Author:
    Bachar Rima
    See Also:
    AbstractConversion, Class, FContext
